scripts.dev: concurrently --names "FRONT,SERVER,STORYBOOK" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow" "npm run dev:front" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:storybook"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd front && npm install
scripts.lint:check: biome check . && cd front && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: biome check --write . && cd front && npm run lint:fix
